entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
